document.full_text: the miami heat claimed a spot in the nba finals with an 83-80 win over the chicago bulls in game 5 of the eastern conference finals.
document.title: heat stun bulls with 4th-quarter comeback to go to nba finals
lines_and_colors: the miami heat claimed a spot in the nba finals with an 83-80 win over the chicago bulls in game 5 of the eastern conference finals.
